I don't see how its a nerf though. I mean, yeah the range reduction on her ult is definitely a nerf, but making her E no longer proc Q is a buff. It allows you to ultimately deal more damage. See, if you Q someone and then ult into them, you are guaranteed an auto-attack on them, hence proccing the Q, dealing the damage of both your initial Q, ultimate, auto-attack and Q proc. If you instead were to use E to proc Q instead of an auto-attack, then you would deal the damage of your initial Q, ultimate, E and Q proc. Now, with E no longer proccing Q, you can still get the auto-attack in, meaning you deal damage with initial Q, ultimate, E, auto-attack, and Q proc. You're getting an auto-attack's worth of damage into it. This could be exploited if you were to get Lich Bane or something like that.

Yes procing the Q with the E was usually better for more damage but that doesn't mean you don't use E to proc it at all for example if you double Q now the combo would be Q-R-AA-Q-R-AA because by the time you proc the first one most people will run out of AA range whereas before it was Q-R-AA-Q-E meaning you only needed to use one ult charge. A lot of times you may need to use E because AAing is not an option say someone with a melee range ability (volibear flip etc) is chasing you down E allowed you to Q-E and stay out of range of that ability whilst still running away overall the nerf is just annoying and not changing much about her overall power.

You can get the cooldown of Q to be under a second?

My stance on it is that this change, ultimately, increases her damage *BUT* it increases the amount of time she has to spend in doing so, hence meaning if the enemy escapes early, they'll avoid a lot of damage.

Overall, I like it.

RIP assassins.
I had a feeling Akali would get nerfed. Akali was insanely hard to shut down when fed and if she got a little bit ahead then she just snowballed into a delete button for squishes.

Maybe she is broken in bronze and silver but once you play against competent players who know how to shut down an akali and her roams you realise she was balanced. There is a reason she doesn't see major competitive play, if she is played there they would absolutely destroy her.
